alert.note: Alert for Color Country West Desert; Grand Staircase; Mojave Desert (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 15 at 2:38PM MDT until June 17 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 495, 497, AND 498... The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 495 Color Country West Desert, Fire Weather Zone 497 Mojave Desert and Fire Weather Zone 498 Grand Staircase. * WINDS...South to southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. Winds will be strongest in the Color Country West Desert and Mojave Desert as well as the western Grand Staircase areas. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...6 to 10 percent. Poor overnight recovery is expected Friday night. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that there is a potential for critical fire weather conditions. Continue to monitor for the latest forecasts and for possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Color Country West Desert; Grand Staircase; Mojave Desert
